name: Hamster Roll 2: VENGEANCE
description:
Join Melvin Jumbley Junior the hamster as he fulfills his need for speed! Race your way across 4 different levels! Listen to some funky tunes! Find several bugs that we missed in the development process!  Listen to us tell you that they're definitely intentional because they might help you complete the levels faster!

(hey guys its melvin i need your help they put me in the game and i cant escape and its like in the matrix where if you die in the game you die in real life please get me out)
